single_tweet.when_to_use: Simple announcements, single features, quick updates

thread.structure:
Tweet 1: Hook + main announcement
Tweet 2-3: Feature bullets with benefits
Tweet 4: CTA + link
thread.when_to_use: Complex features, multiple announcements, detailed explanations

formatting_rules: Lead with hook, question, or bold statement
Keep under 280 chars OR break into thread
